references.paper_title: Accurate medium-range global weather forecasting with 3d neural networks
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it demonstrates the state-of-the-art in AI-based weather forecasting, which is the application domain of the current research.

references.paper_title: Towards an end-to-end artificial intelligence driven global weather forecasting system
references.reason: This is a foundational work for the current study, proposing a data assimilation model that is central to the current paper's approach.
This paper introduces the fundamental concept of neural processes, which is the core architecture used in this paper for data assimilation.
This paper provides the theoretical foundation for neural processes, the core architecture of this research.
This paper introduces the neural processes family, which provides a comprehensive overview of the architecture and different variants used in this paper
